headline: Is Adobe's (ADBE) AI-Powered Mobile Editing and Ecommerce Data Shaping Its Growth Narrative?
summary: Adobe recently launched a new iPhone app for its Premiere video editor, offering professional-level mobile editing and AI-powered tools, while Adobe's holiday forecasts highlighted strong growth in US online sales, driven by generative AI shopping and flexible payment trends. This underscores Adobe's influence across both creative technology and ecommerce analytics, as its software and data shape how consumers and retailers approach digital experiences and shopping habits. We'll examine how...

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid ADBE and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Since April 2025, Adobe has been in a holding pattern, posting a small return of 2.7% while floating around $349.87. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 33.2% gain during that period.
